plot: Route 168 is a curious anecdote about a bus ride, where a girl struggles with an aggressive and irrational atmosphere. Without any logical explanation all the passengers are staring at her.
title: Ruta 168
plot_es: Route 168 is a curious anecdote about a bus ride, where a girl struggles with an aggressive and irrational atmosphere. Without any logical explanation all the passengers are staring at her.
plot_en: Route 168 is a curious anecdote about a bus ride, where a girl struggles with an aggressive and irrational atmosphere. Without any logical explanation all the passengers are staring at her.
